description: Shane Frost is dancing at the Powerhouse bar and things get out of hand. Spencer Reed and his buddies drag the boy off the stage. They tie up the boy in front of the rowdy crowd. Shane is made to suck cocks, eat asses and lick feet. After flogging the hell out of Shane, Spencer and his buddies fuck the boy and make him beg for their loads.
title: Horny men attack a go-go boy at the Powerhouse bar
